RunningStandalone.comment: must be true,if Elbfisch is run standalone

EnableTrace.comment: enables tracing of the module activity

TraceTimeMinutes.comment: used to estimate the length of the trace buffer [min]

pauseOnBreakPoint.comment: cycle is paused,until all modules enter waiting state

RemoteSignalsEnabled.comment: enable connections to/from remote JPac instances

RemoteSignalPort.comment: server port for remote signal access

HistogramFile.comment: file in which the histograms are stored

CyclicTaskShutdownTimeoutTime.comment: Timeout for all cyclic tasks to stop on shutdown [ns]

MaxShutdownTime.comment: period of time in which all modules must have been terminated in case of a shutdown [ns]

ServicePort.comment: port over which the opc ua service is provided

BindAddress.comment: address the opc ua service is bound to
